high_concept: High Concept: In the sun-drenched villas of Amalfi, where stone walls hug cliff-side secrets and lemon groves whisper of bitter-sweetness, Lena Castillo—a divorce attorney jaded by love—collides once again with Marco Vitale, her old flame who broke her heart. Forced to co-plan her best friend’s wedding in this picturesque setting, Lena must confront the man and the memory that shattered her belief in true connection. As they navigate shared balconies and hidden coves, their undeniable chemistry reignites against a backdrop of family tragedy and long-buried secrets. But when a revelation from the past threatens to shatter the wedding’s blissful facade and expose Lena's professional truth, she is pushed to choose between her protective cynicism and the vulnerability that real love demands. Will this sun-soaked reunion melt away years of guarded walls or confirm Lena’s worst fears that love always ends in divorce?
